Would you please add that as comment? Also, how about:

Status status;
if (input 0 is tensor and input 1 is weight) {
  status = BinaryTensorOpWeight(..., false, ...);
} else if (input 0 is weight and input 1 is tensor) {
  status = BinaryTensorOpWeight(..., true, ...);

#if NV_TENSORRT_MAJOR == 3
} else {
#else
}
if ((input 0 is tensor and input 1 is tensor) || !status.ok()) {
#endif

  status = BinaryTensorOpTensor(...);
}
#endif

return status;
